```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(camcorder)
library(here)
library(showtext)

# Set working directory
setwd(here::here("{{project_dir}}"))

# Setup fonts
font_add_google("Atkinson Hyperlegible", "atkinson")
showtext_auto()

# Setup camcorder
gg_record(
  dir = here("output"),
  device = "png",
  width = 10,
  height = 8,
  units = "in",
  dpi = 300
)

# Load data
tuesdata <- tt_load({{year}}, week = {{week}})
```
